name: EveScape Shuttle (bakoboko)
description:
EveScape Shuttle is an escape room game made for a University assignment in which we were allowed to use the Eve Franchise IP.

Your ship is going down, race against the clock to repair the required systems before it explodes. Use Neural Boosters to help you solve puzzles but be aware that over-consumption of them can lead to nasty consequences for your psyche.
